bullet_points: Developing a fan-game in Unity & C#.
Developed a Python library that manages files on Amazon S3.
Introduced Python 2/3 compatibility to DocCenter API, which is part of our microservices architecture. Upgraded Django Rest Framework and other libraries.
Removed sensitive data from source code using Vault API.
Developed an event reminder system in PHP that automatically sends emails to hosts.
Used web scraping and Tableau to present visualized data on women and minorities in EdTech.
